snippet.title: New Game (Gameplay) - Percy the Penguin Saves Christmas
snippet.description:
Uh-oh! Santa's sleigh had a mishap, and now the only one who can save Christmas is Percy the Penguin (with a little help from his girlfriend, Polly)!  Help Percy stun all the rogue toys, and wrap them back in their presents before it's too late! But watch out, rumor has it an evil ghost gang might be behind all this... Only you can find out in "Percy the Penguin Saves Christmas", the old-school arcade style platformer for 1-2 players, by PixelDough!

For PC and Mac
https://pixeldough.itch.io/percy-the-penguin

Want to see more fun games like this? Support my game development on my Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/PixelDough
